HUD Corner.toolTip: Corner 0 to 3 - bottom right, bottom left, top right, top left

Percent to show damage.toolTip: Show damage instead of durability while the item is still better than this %

Set window title.toolTip: Set window title to player and server name

Minimum Percent.toolTip: Play sound when durability below X percent

Armor around hotbar.toolTip: Render armor around hotbar (instead of with tools)

Minimum Durability.toolTip: Play sound when durability below X
